title: Going Beyond a Mercenary Love for God
itunes:title: Going Beyond a Mercenary Love for God
description: The Bible constantly warns against a merely mercenary relationship with God—a friendship of convenience or self-interest. We should not love God simply because doing so will produce many consolations in our life. We must enter a true relationship, where we fall in love not with his benefits, but with him.
